ValidationRule.description: For CAS: This validation rule will throw error if the EtQ number CMP- is left blank for the specified values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( (ISBLANK(EtQ__c)), OR( RecordType.Name = "Zimmer CAS Optical Call Center", RecordType.Name = "Zimmer CAS PSI Call Center", RecordType.Name = "Zimmer CAS Support Call Center", RecordType.Name = "Zimmer CAS iAssist Call Center"),
OR ( (ISPICKVAL(PSI_Solution__c,"Complaint - Forward to EtQ")), (ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"CS - D - Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"PSI - G - Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Category_Type__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"ETQ #")) ) )
